name: Torchlight (itch) (4rt3m1s)
description: You are trapped. You do not know where. You must stay out of the darkness. Ration your matches - you only have 30. Good luck. Controls are: SPACEBAR - to relight match, WASD - to move,  L-SHIFT - to sprint(this will make your match go out faster, though) and E - to interact. I have had to re-upload the game as a result of a bug.
